user.title: Connect to Firefly Cloud
user.description: Enter your school's Firefly code to connect to your school's Firefly system.

data_description.school_code: Enter your school's Firefly code (usually found in your school's Firefly URL, e.g., 'myschool' from myschool.fireflycloud.net)

auth.title: Authenticate with Firefly
auth.description:
Complete authentication by logging into Firefly in your browser.

**Instructions:**
1. Click the authentication URL above to open Firefly
2. Log in with your Firefly credentials
3. After successful login, open browser developer tools (F12)
4. Go to Console tab and type: `document.documentElement.outerHTML`
5. Copy the entire response (should contain `<token>...</token>`)
6. Paste it in the field below

data_description.auth_response: Paste the full HTML response containing the authentication token

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate with Firefly
reauth_confirm.description:
Your Firefly authentication has expired. Please log in again using the same process.

**Instructions:**
1. Click the authentication URL above to open Firefly
2. Log in with your Firefly credentials
3. After successful login, open browser developer tools (F12)
4. Go to Console tab and type: `document.documentElement.outerHTML`
5. Copy the entire response (should contain `<token>...</token>`)
6. Paste it in the field below
